'''House Degore''' is a noble house from [[the North]]. They are unique to ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.
sections.In the books: House Degore has no analogue in the novels, being an invention of Telltale.
sections.Members: * Ser [[Royland Degore]], the last surviving member of the house and [[master-at-arms]] for [[Ironrath]].
sections.History:
===Background===
House Degore fought against the [[Ironborn]] during the [[Greyjoy Rebellion]], where the majority of the house was killed. The lone survivor, [[Royland Degore]], was awarded a [[knighthood]] by [[Robert Baratheon|King Robert Baratheon]] for his service during the [[Siege of Pyke]].
==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
The Degores are mentioned in Royand's codex entry, detailing what happened during the rebellion.
